scripts.build:
node -e "const fs=require('node:fs'); const p=require('node:path'); const {spawnSync}=require('node:child_process'); const tsconfigPath=p.join(process.cwd(),'tsconfig.json'); const nextEnvPath=p.join(process.cwd(),'next-env.d.ts'); const dist='.next-build-'+Date.now(); const env={...process.env,NEXT_DIST_DIR:dist}; const result=spawnSync('next',['build'],{stdio:'inherit',shell:true,env}); try { const raw=fs.readFileSync(tsconfigPath,'utf8'); const cfg=JSON.parse(raw); const include=Array.isArray(cfg.include)?cfg.include:[]; cfg.include=include.filter((item)=>!/^\.next-build-\d+/types/\*\*/\*\.ts$/.test(String(item))); fs.writeFileSync(tsconfigPath, JSON.stringify(cfg, null, 2)+'
'); if (fs.existsSync(nextEnvPath)) { const lines=fs.readFileSync(nextEnvPath,'utf8').split(/?
/).filter((line)=>!line.includes('.next-build-')); fs.writeFileSync(nextEnvPath, lines.join('
').trimEnd()+'
'); } } catch (_) {} process.exit(result.status ?? 1);"
